title: SUEZ — Power BI Certification Progress Dashboard
context: Power BI dashboard built for a SUEZ project to help stakeholders track certification progress across teams and support decision-making.
impact: Centralized certification progress tracking for multiple teams
Improved visibility for managers with clear KPIs and drill-down views
Reduced manual reporting by consolidating data into a single dashboard
status: Internal project developed at Avanade — live access no longer available

title: MSCD — Internal Contract & Quality Management Application
context: Internal application built during my time at Avanade to track signed contracts end-to-end. The solution covered all required processes and validation steps to ensure consistent follow-up and support long-term quality management.
impact: Centralized contract tracking from signature to delivery
Standardized processes and validation steps across teams
Improved visibility and traceability for quality management
Reduced manual follow-up through automated workflows
status: Internal project developed at Avanade — live access no longer available. Presented through screenshots for confidentiality reasons.
